Part One: Brand Strategy

Five perspectives on what the brand stands for


Perspective 1: Brand Ambition

What we are striving to be known for:

We are the Navy Seals of Architecture/Landscape Architecture Schools: ambitious, exclusive, and astonishingly effective.

Perspective 2: Brand Purpose

The reason we are excited about SALA:

SALA is the birthplace of ideas that better the world.

Perspective 3: Brand Values

Characteristics that are key to the institution:

Innovation: When challenged or intrigued we develop unique responses that work.

Curiosity: Our culture encourages explorers, who will find collaborators amongst faculty, students, staff and the outside world.

Freedom: Students and Faculty are free to satisfy their own intellectual interests.

Ambition: We foster people and ideas that are using architecture and landscape architecture as a means to better the world.

Perspective 4: Brand Essence

The philosophy that drives us forward, our institutional DNA:

To better the world, the best minds must first understand it.

Perspective 5: Brand Promise

Our commitment to our audiences:

Join us, help us, and together we will foster the people and ideas that will make the world a better place.
